text: Squire Fridell (born February 9, 1943) is an American actor, best known for playing Ronald McDonald in the McDonald's commercials after King Moody's retirement. ==Early life== Fridell was born in Oakland, California on February 9, 1943. ==Career== ===Ronald McDonald character=== After King Moody's retirement in 1984, Fridell was hired to replace him as Ronald McDonald in McDonald's commercials. He did this until 1991 when he was replaced by Jack Deopke. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Actors from Oakland, California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people
title: Squire Fridell
